passage_text: More than 55 Years of Building Exceptional Homes. Brothers Harry and Frank Bielinski started Bielinski Homes in 1960 by building exceptional homes on customer lots throughout the nine-county area of Southeastern Wisconsin – from as far south as Kenosha, north to Washington and west to Jefferson counties. Since then, Bielinski Homes has built more than 10,000 homes. With everything in one location, making decisions is convenient and easy! Finally, your home will be backed by comprehensive new home and product warranties. Beyond the expected, Harry and Frank Bielinski put their name on the door more than 55 years ago.

Home Building Sites. The City of Milwaukee has hundreds of opportunities for new home building. Our affordable lot prices can put a newly constructed home within your reach. Building a house in one of Milwaukee’s urban neighborhoods puts you close to downtown, jobs, shopping, schools, entertainment and parks. Milwaukee’s extensive transit system can allow your family to live with just one car and roll the savings into that dream home
